title: Section 3.1.1 Jaynes’s arguments may be found in Jaynes

Zellner has proposed the Bayesian Method of Moments when there are difficulties in formulating a likelihood function. The method can be employed to compute postdata moments of parameters and future values of variables without a likelihood function
